definition: University of California/abbr. for 加利福尼亞大學|加利福尼亚大学[Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2]
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: This is a full-time position in Irvine , California.
sentences.chinese: 这是加州大学欧文分校生物科学院的网站。

sentences.english: I am a graduate of Hong Kong University, and have in addition the M. A. degree from UCLA.
sentences.chinese: 本人毕业于香港大学，并在加州大学文学硕士学位。

sentences.english: Kaylin will be attending University of California, Davis in the fall to study environmental science.
sentences.chinese: 黄恺琳将就读于戴维斯加州大学攻读环境科学。

sentences.english: He holds a Master of Arts from University of California, Berkeley.
sentences.chinese: 他是加州大学伯克莱分校的硕士。

sentences.english: Elaine Kim, professor of Asian American studies, University of California, Berkeley.
sentences.chinese: 金惠经，亚裔美国文学研究教授，加州大学，伯克利。

sentences.english: Check out this article from the University of California - Berkeley’s career center.
sentences.chinese: 查阅这篇来自加州大学伯克利分校职涯中心的文章。

sentences.english: Wesley will be attending University of California, Los Angles in the fall majoring in political science.
sentences.chinese: 苏思理将就读于洛杉矶加州大学攻读政治学。
后来又去了加州大学伯克利分校。
“旧金山加州大学，”一个酥脆的声音回答。

sentences.english: That’s what sociologists at the University of California, San Diego, were wondering.
sentences.chinese: 加州大学圣地亚哥分校的社会学家们想知道答案。

sentences.english: UC Santa Barbara and University of Utah later join.
sentences.chinese: 加州大学圣芭芭拉分校和犹他大学随后加入。

sentences.english: Dr. Kathleen Connell is a professor at Haas Graduate Business School, University of California, Berkeley.
sentences.chinese: 作者系加州大学伯克利分校经济学教授。
